text: Some of the studios to approach: Jellyfish Pictures, The Mill, Framestore and Double Negative. Also, checkout <https://www.nextgenskillsacademy.com/course/apprenticeships|https://www.nextgenskillsacademy.com/course/apprenticeships>

attachments.title: NextGen Skills Academy | Apprenticeships
attachments.text: Earn as you learn in the workplace. Take time out to study in the classroom. A NextGen Apprenticeship can offer the best of both worlds, giving you invaluable experience and knowledge to kick-start your career. ‚Äç
